intro: Pseudobartsia yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan pseudobartsia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white to pinkish flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
